events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle on Main Street during rush hour.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial reports from the customer.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the claim and guide the customer through the process.
Customer received confirmation that the accident claim was acknowledged and is under review.
Requested accident photos, police report, and vehicle damage estimates to proceed with evaluation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and official police report.
The investigation team began reviewing the evidence and assessing liability related to the accident.
The investigation confirmed the other driver was at fault and the claim is valid.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair costs and vehicle rental during downtime.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling and clear communication throughout claim.
The claim was approved by management following the settlement agreement with the customer.
Payment for the approved settlement was processed and transferred to the customerâ€™s account today.
The claim case was officially closed after full payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived in compliance with company policy.
